Posts.Content: KarenSil15693 wrote: I had an excisional biopsy on March 9th, the steri strips came off today and the scar looks alot worse than I expected even though I know my body tends to form lumpy scars. I know this scar is small compared to mx scars, but I was wondering if anyone had any suggestions to smooth the scar out. Do the over the counter creams like Mederma work? Thanks for your input.
